name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The U.S. House of Representatives ended its "China Week" on Monday with the passage of a series of bills aimed at addressing various threats from the Chinese Communist Party. These bills cover a variety of areas, including biosecurity, drones, agriculture, and battery dependence. Many companies are involved, including BGI, WuXi Biologics, WuXi AppTec, DJI, Guoxuan High-tech, BYD, Envision Technology, CATL, EVE Energy, and Haichen Energy Storage.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a game anchor covered the game interface with a picture before entering the game in order to prevent sensitive IDs from appearing in the live broadcast.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The latest engineering textbook "Fundamentals of Engineering Materials and Mechanical Manufacturing" published by Peking University Press has begun to incorporate ideological and political content.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of the 13th, the Education, Culture and Sports Bureau of Zhengzhou Economic and Technological Development Zone issued a notice on the distribution of student meal ingredients at the East Campus of Jingkai Foreign Languages School: Starting from breakfast on September 13, the original food distribution company of the East Campus of Jingkai Foreign Languages School will be temporarily suspended, and another supplier with corresponding qualifications will be selected to deliver the ingredients.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 13, at the Zhengzhou Economic and Technological Development Zone Foreign Language School, a catering company smuggled banned ingredients in the middle of the night. After the parents discovered this, they surrounded the school gate.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, when some netizens used the domestic AI Wenxin Yiyan to search, the AI directly pushed links to pornography and adult products.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 14, a netizen reported that if he sent the word "retire" to the CCTV News official account, the account would automatically reply with a photo of Ganyu police officers. As of now, sending the word "retire" will no longer receive a photo.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 13, the Ministry of Finance imposed the maximum penalty on PricewaterhouseCoopers for its illegal gains in the Evergrande Real Estate audit project, and imposed a severe penalty of suspending its business for 6 months on PricewaterhouseCoopers, which bore the main responsibility.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: American rapper Kanye will arrive in Haikou for a performance. Many Xinjiang Uyghur netizens reported that their tickets were refunded without reason by the platform before the concert started, and some fans have even arrived in Haikou.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 14, Guangdong University of Technology. The Internet revealed that the school leaders frequently made golden sentences during the military training speech, "You dare to betray even the color of your ancestors", "Why is your hair color the same as Trump's", "You don't believe in Yanhuang but Trump, and Trump has a younger son who is even less reliable"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 14, the Ahu High Frequency Processing Factory in Ruian, Wenzhou, owed migrant workers half a year's wages. The migrant workers held up banners to demand their wages and were forcibly taken away by the police and a large number of armed police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a netizen’s contribution, a school recently asked parents to download and register the “Digital RMB” APP, and give priority to the use of digital RMB in various online and offline payment scenarios.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 13 (Released) Dalian, Liaoning. The urban management confiscated the vegetables from the vendors, and the vendors knelt down to beg for mercy. The urban management said, "You haven't moved since this morning."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 13, a blogger with 387,000 followers on Weibo was detained for 15 days for posting content about pensions and real estate. He said, "I will be more careful with my words in the future. If you ask me what 1+1 equals, I will tell you whatever it is, but it is not 2 anyway."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to Taiwanese media reports, a 31-year-old man from Ningbo, Zhejiang, sneaked into Taiwan in a rubber boat in the early morning of the 14th and was rescued by the Coast Guard and sent to medical treatment. It is reported that the man sneaked into Taiwan because he was in debt in the mainland, so he wanted to start a new life in Taiwan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 14, Chongqing. The man posted a video saying that he was the financial director of a grain and oil company. In 2014, he surrendered for corruption and was sentenced to 10 years in prison. Another main culprit, Li Changkui, was the former vice chairman of the Youyang County CPPCC and director of the Grain Bureau. He was also sentenced but did not serve his sentence. He is still at large, and the property purchased by Li Changkui with the embezzled money has not been reclaimed by the court.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 12, a former employee of Shanghai Angli Education Institution posted that he was fired for refusing to buy breakfast for his boss. Chat screenshots showed that the boss said, "Always let me have mineral water to drink, a cup of Luckin coffee in the morning," etc. The employee asked the boss to prepay for the meal on the grounds of financial constraints, but the boss retorted: If you don't have money, you have to earn it yourself, you can't ask me for it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 13, the South Korean president and his wife brought their pet dog to send Mid-Autumn Festival greetings to the South Korean people. Netizens responded, "If you don't have your own culture, you can only steal others'," "Mid-Autumn Festival is Chinese, and Hanbok is the evolution of Ming Dynasty Hanfu, damn Koreans."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 13 (Released) Shenzhen, Guangdong. A group of primary school students repeatedly trampled on the Japanese flag.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 11, Global Times: China has solved a technology that has troubled the West.
September 13, Bad Ball Times: Experts urgently remind: Beware of Western think tanks "praising" China's scientific and technological capabilities.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Chongqing, a man from the UK claimed to have opened a factory in China and asked how to recruit workers. As a result, the comment area instantly turned into a large recruitment site, with a large number of netizens leaving messages about their expected salaries, hoping to be hired.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 14, it was revealed online that two Chinese women at Tokyo Haneda Airport in Japan were fighting over queue-jumping, pulling each other's hair, and the scene was chaotic. The Japanese police standing by were helpless, unable to understand their quarrel and didn't know how to stop them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 13, Zhoukou, Henan. A woman posted a video saying that her 13-year-old child, who was studying at Zhoukou Sports School, drowned while at school recently. The body was snatched away as soon as it was salvaged, and the family has not been able to see the body so far.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 13 (Released) Shaanxi. A takeaway boy squatted on the ground and broke down crying, and an old lady came forward to comfort him.
Recently, in Anhui, a middle-aged couple both lost their jobs. They lamented: I didn't expect that life would revolve around mortgage payments. "Over the years, the mortgage payments have been increasing, and now I am almost penniless."
